data.name: UXDX
data.description: UXDX brings together UX, Design, Dev and Product to learn how to shift from delivering projects to working as cross-functional teams that build products customers actually want. Come and join us on 8 - 9 October, 2020 in Dublin to learn more.

relatedRecords.name: THAT Conference
relatedRecords.description: THAT Conference is the Summer Camp for Geeks that combines technology, networking, social events and exposure in an inspirational, family friendly environment at the The Kalahari Resort in Wisconsin Dells.

relatedRecords.name: Cambridge Wireless International Conference
relatedRecords.location: Wellcome Genome Campus Conference Centre, Hinxton, UK
relatedRecords.description: The CW International Conference (CWIC) is the flagship event for Cambridge’s world-renowned technology community. It attracts companies from across the world who want to learn from and do business with the UK’s most innovative city.
